00001 #include "SimPlugins/PhotonuclearXsecBiasingMessenger.h"
00002 
00003 // LDMX
00004 #include "SimPlugins/PhotonuclearXsecBiasingPlugin.h"
00005 
00006 // STL
00007 #include <string>
00008 
00009 namespace ldmx {
00010 
00011     PhotonuclearXsecBiasingMessenger::PhotonuclearXsecBiasingMessenger(PhotonuclearXsecBiasingPlugin* biasingPlugin) :
00012             UserActionPluginMessenger(biasingPlugin), biasingPlugin_(biasingPlugin) {
00013 
00014         xsecFactorCmd_ = new G4UIcommand(std::string(getPath() + "xsecFactor").c_str(), this);
00015         G4UIparameter* modulus = new G4UIparameter("xsecFactor", 'd', false);
00016         xsecFactorCmd_->SetParameter(modulus);
00017         xsecFactorCmd_->SetGuidance("Set the cross section biasing factor for the photonuclear process (must be >= 100.)");
00018         xsecFactorCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit, G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00019     }
00020 
00021     void PhotonuclearXsecBiasingMessenger::SetNewValue(G4UIcommand *command, G4String newValue) {
00022         if (command == xsecFactorCmd_) {
00023             biasingPlugin_->setXsecBiasingFactor(std::stod(newValue));
00024         }
00025     }
00026 
00027 } // namespace sim
